evidence_extraction:
[
  "In fact, I'm a Black Nationalist freedom fighter.",
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "If you're black, you were born in jail.",
  "We have injected ourselves into the civil rights struggle. And we intend to expand it from the level of civil rights to the level of human rights.",
  "all she's got to do is give the black man in this country everything that's due him, everything.",
  "trapped, trapped, double-trapped, triple-trapped. Any way we go, we find that we're trapped.",
  "Whenever you got a racial powder keg sitting in your lap, you're in more trouble than if you had an atomic powder keg sitting in your lap.",
  "churches are being bombed, whose little girls are being murdered, whose leaders are being shot down in broad daylight?",
  "And you and I have to make a start. And the best place to start is right in the community where we live.",
  "And once you and I go into business, we own and operate at least the businesses in our community. What we will be doing is developing a situation, wherein, we will actually be able to create employment for the people in the community.",
  "it'll take black nationalism today to remove colonialism from the backs and the minds of twenty-two million Afro-Americans here in this country.",
  "The white man, the white man is too intelligent to let someone else come and gain control of the economy of his community. But you will let anybody come in and control the economy of your community...",
  "the Man is becoming richer and richer, and you're becoming poorer and poorer.",
  "unfair advantage (implied through the system of exploitation and control by 'the Man').",
  "Mr. Moderator, Rev. Cleage, brothers and sisters and friends, and I see some enemies.",
  "All of us catch hell from the same enemy. We're all in the same bag, in the same boat.",
  "Not only is he a crook, he's a hypocrite. Here he is standing up in front of other people, Uncle Sam, with the blood of your and mine mothers and fathers on his hands. With the blood dripping down his jaws like a bloody-jawed wolf.",
  "Mr. Moderator, Rev. Cleage, brothers and sisters and friends...",
  "But if we keep our religion at home...when we come out here we have a fight that's common to all of us against a enemy who is common to all of us.",
  "I say in my conclusion, the only way we're going to solve it: we got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony.",
  "Revolutions overturn systems. Revolutions destroy systems.",
  "it'll take black nationalism today to remove colonialism from the backs and the minds of twenty-two million Afro-Americans here in this country.",
  "This is why I say it's the ballot or the bullet. It's liberty or it's death. It's freedom for everybody or freedom for nobody.",
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "The economic philosophy of black nationalism only means that we should own and operate and control the economy of our community.",
  "join any kind of organization – civic, religious, fraternal, political or otherwise that's based on lifting the black man up and making him master of his own community."
]
Total quotes in analysis: 30
